description: Dashboard displaying metrics from CI and CD systems.
name: VCS Metrics
title: CI/CD Observability

b9dd0cdf-362a-42c1-8f93-44a476c51c97.name: repository.name
b9dd0cdf-362a-42c1-8f93-44a476c51c97.queryValue:
SELECT DISTINCT JSONExtractString(labels, 'vcs.repository.name') AS repository_name
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'vcs.ref.time'

widgets.description: The average number of branches in the repository.
widgets.title: # Branches (avg)

widgets.description: The average age of a branch.
widgets.title: Branch Age (avg)

widgets.description: Average time taken to approve a change.
widgets.title: Change Approval Time (avg)

widgets.description: Average time taken to merge a change. This metric is a part of the larger Change Lead Time DORA metric.
widgets.title: Change Merge Time (avg)

widgets.description: The number of contributors over time
widgets.title: # Contributors

widgets.description: Average time a change is in open state.
widgets.title: Change Age (avg)

widgets.description: The number of changes by state. State can be open/closed/merged.
widgets.title: # Changes

widgets.description: Number of lines changed in the given time period.
widgets.title: # Lines changed

widgets.description: Number of pipeline runs grouped by status.
widgets.title: # Statuses
